title: IS_BOAT_WRECKED
content:
0x9049DB44// IsBoatWrecked
bool IS_BOAT_WRECKED(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.Returns: Returns whether or not the boat is wrecked.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_BOAT_WRECKED
IsBoatWrecked(vehicle)
